title: 7 Best Hot Air Balloon Rides In USA
text:
Home > Featured > 7 Best Hot Air Balloon Rides In USA 7 Best Hot Air Balloon Rides In USA By admin on October 14, 2015 Pin It 
Hot air balloon rides in the US are described as woven wicker vessels possessing the potential of carrying people to the highest heights for seeing landscapes from fearful angles. 
The best hot air balloon rides in USA are the ones that splash down rivers and hover over the deserts and the waterfalls. Every individual might be aware of the fact that a hot air balloon ride is exhilarating. Most hot air balloon rides in the US are great while there are others which tend to be more spectacular in comparison to the others. USA’s Best Hot Air Balloon Rides 
Some of the best hot air balloon rides in USA have been described below: Rocky Mountains, Colorado Photo Credits: Balloon Colorado 
The Rocky Mountains have a visual appeal and they are really striking. The hot air balloon rides at the Rocky Mountains are provided by Fair Winds and Rocky Mountain Hot Air. Both these operators charge around $195 for a single flight. Napa Valley, California Photo Credits: charles young 
The Napa valley hot air balloon ride experience is undoubtedly the best throughout the world and is definitely worth experiencing by each and every individual in this world. You are offered a bird’s eye view of the entire region by a hot air balloon which would cost around $215 per individual. Letchworth State Park, New York Photo Credits: balloonsoverletchworth.com 
This park lies at a distance of around 2 hours from the Niagara Falls and therefore you can combine both these trips together. Aerial experience delivered by the hot air balloon rides at this park is truly amazing. The cost is $245 per flight. Newberg, Oregon Photo Credits: David Nelson 
Newberg in Oregon is famous for the hot air balloon rides offered at this place. By taking a ride in one of the hot air balloons offered by some operators, you will get to experience the beauty of the Willamette River and the Willamette Valley. Asheville, North Carolina Photo Credits: Doug 
Asheville serves as home to Biltmore Estate which is the largest private home located in America. Taking a hot air balloon ride around this place is a real treat to the eyes and the senses. You can have perfect view of Black Smoky Mountains in the backdrop from the balloon. Cave Creek, Arizona Photo Credits: Thales 
Cave Creek in Arizona is another place to enjoy best hot air balloon rides in United States. This is wonderful experience to enjoy the hot air balloon ride over the Sonora Desert. Take the unique sunrise tour, which lets you enjoy the beautiful view of sunrise and wonderful landscape. Lake Tahoe, Nevada Photo Credits: Jim Snyder 
Lake Tahoe is a beautiful fresh water lake in Nevada, which is located along the borders of Nevada and California. It is really a wonderful experience to float over Lake Tahoe and enjoy the reflection of balloon over the lake. Apart from the wonderful view of lake, you can also enjoy the view of Emerald and peaks of Yosemite.
